title: svAmikku sari
sahitya:
SsvAmikku sari evarE candra vadanan shrI krSNa


anupallavi

  shyAma sundara jagan mOhana lAvaNyan kOmaLa caraNan
 gOpikA ramaNan kuLir naghai taLar naDai bAla krSNa


caraNam    pArk-kaDal adanil paLLi koNDavan pAril nanda gOpAlanAi pirandu
pAl tayir veNNai tiruDi uNDavan padam paNiyum anbar bhava-nOi ara
vandaruLum en sarasa gOpAla
